Name: DodgeBall VR
About the game: The Year is 3020 & Earths way of life has changed forever from the way we know it. Individuals are competing for freedom through your favorite childhood game, Dodgeball... Play through our challenging arenas with your team and fight for survival in our 3 vs 3 Online Multiplayer matches. Avoid being hit by antimatter balls being thrown at you, while getting key power ups to help your team win. Challenge yourself to get the highest score and be ranked on the leader board.
Meta Title: DodgeBall VR: Oct 28, 2020, Mieron Studios and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on DodgeBall VR? Check out the release date (Oct 28, 2020), developer insights from Mieron Studios, and a complete game summary.
